name: Little Bird Applique Onesie
description:
This sweet Little Bird appliqué is a wonderful gift to baby or toddler for any occasion and is always a hit at baby showers.  The contrasting yellow stitching gives this onesie uniqueness and the hand stitched beak and button eyes add to its stupendous charm.  

All my appliqué onesies and t-shirts include a Momma Loves Baby tag with washing instructions and is gift wrapped in tissue paper and tied with ribbon, making it perfect for gift giving!  

I take great care in each appliqué onesie/shirt and no two are ever the same since each one is individually cut, sewn and hand stitched.  For onesies I use a white short-sleeved Gerber brand tagless onesie in sizes 0-3 up to 24 months. For the toddler t-shirts I use a lightweight Fruit of the Loom t-shirt which is perfect for the summer!  Fraying of edges on appliqués is expected with washings and gives the onesie a hip worn look. 

Please Specify Size in: 0-3, 3-6, 6-9, 12, 18 or 24 months for onesies or Small (2t-4t), Medium (5t-6t) for toddler t-shirts.

name: Whistling Whale Applique Onesie
description:
This Whistling Whale is a fun little onesie or t-shirt for your special little person.  The yellow stitching contrast with the blue whale body, and the button eye just tops this onesie or t-shirt off with cuteness.  Whistling Whale makes for a wonderful gift to baby or toddler for any occasion and is a popular gift for a baby shower.  This Whistling Whale onesie is truly unique and completely charming. 

All my appliqué onesies and t-shirts include a Momma Loves Baby tag with washing instructions and is gift wrapped in tissue paper and tied with ribbon, making it perfect for gift giving!  

I take great care in each appliqué onesie/shirt and no two are ever the same since each one is individually cut, sewn and hand stitched.  For onesies I use a white short-sleeved Gerber brand tagless onesie in sizes 0-3 up to 24 months. For the toddler t-shirts I use a lightweight Fruit of the Loom t-shirt which is perfect for the summer!  Fraying of edges on appliqués is expected with washings and gives the onesie a hip worn look. 

Please Specify Size: 0-3, 3-6, 6-9, 12, 18 or 24 months for onesies or Small (2t-4t), Medium (5t-6t) for toddler t-shirts.

name: Tot Tie Applique Onesie
description:
This super cool Tot Tie handmade appliqué is a wonderful gift to baby or toddler for any occasion.  It can be dressed up or dressed down but either way your little one is sure to get some head turns.  My son always gets compliments on how cool he looks when he wears his Tot Tie; it is just too cute. 

All my appliqué onesies and t-shirts include a Momma Loves Baby tag with washing instructions and is gift wrapped in tissue paper and tied with ribbon, making it perfect for gift giving!  

The Tot Tie appliqué is Hand Made; it has been hand cut, applied with fusible webbing, and sewn down for extra durability. It is sewn onto a white short-sleeved Gerber brand tagless onesie in sizes 0-3 up to 24 months. For the toddler t-shirts I use a lightweight Fruit of the Loom t-shirt which is perfect for the summer!  Fraying of edges on appliqués is expected with washings and gives the onesie a hip worn look. 

Please Specify Size in: 0-3, 3-6, 6-9, 12, 18 or 24 months for onesies or Small (2t-4t), Medium (5t-6t) for toddler t-shirts.

name: Pink Owl Applique Onesie
description:
This adorable Pretty Pink Owl makes for a special gift to your little one or little friend.  The pink stitching contrast with the brown owl body and wings and the button eyes are a perfect match.  The owls little feet are hand sewn and truly add to the charm of this Pretty Pink Owl.  

All my appliqué onesies and t-shirts include a Momma Loves Baby tag with washing instructions and is gift wrapped in tissue paper and tied with ribbon, making it perfect for gift giving!  

I take great care in each appliqué onesie/shirt and no two are ever the same since each one is individually cut, sewn and hand stitched.  It is sewn onto a white short-sleeved Gerber brand tagless onesie in sizes 0-3 up to 24 months. For the toddler t-shirts I use a lightweight Fruit of the Loom t-shirt which is perfect for the summer!  Fraying of edges on appliqués is expected with washings and gives the onesie a hip worn look. 

Please Specify Size in: 0-3, 3-6, 6-9, 12, 18 or 24 months for onesies or Small (2t-4t), Medium (5t-6t) for toddler t-shirts.

name: Big Bird Applique Tote Bag
description:
This Pink Bird tote is perfect for shopping in the market or going to the water or just about anything you can think of.  You’ll adore this tote with its stitching that contrasts the brown and pink bird and its matching blue button eye.  It is a perfect gift that anyone of any age will completely love or a fun gift for yourself. 

My Pink Bird tote appliqué has been hand cut, applied with fusible webbing, and sewn down for extra durability and appeal. It is sewn onto a pink 100% canvas tote. Fraying of edges is eventually expected and gives the tote a hip worn look.
